name: HomeTouch Care Ltd
description: Operator of an online home care marketplace intended to provide care for dementia and other neurodegenerative conditions. The company's home care marketplace connects people looking for care with self-employed carers and permits care seekers to perform localized searches of carers and filter for specific care experiences as well as watch video profiles and read customer reviews, enabling families to find from home care to professional care.
